Programming Services
For Business
index.mainContent: Comprehensive internet services, including website and online store design, web application development, implementation of CMS/CRM/ERP systems, and professional search engine optimization (SEO).
index.abouttxt1: Our productions are characterized by original ideas, while maintaining the highest technical and visual standards. We are limited only by imagination.
index.abouttxt2: We possess everything necessary to create the most modern IT solutions using the best methods and technologies. Application development, system integration, analysis, and technological assessment are the pillars of our design process and solid architecture.
index.abouttxt3: Website design, E-commerce stores, CRM/ERP company management systems
index.ofertxt1:
Our Company consists of Professionals who help your brand
grow and move forward.
index.ofertxt6: Database design. Optimization of database query execution. SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle Database, MongoDB.
index.ofertxt8: Individual website projects based on Content Management Systems (CMS) such as WordPress or custom-made proprietary systems.
index.ofertxt10: Responsive online stores based on PrestaShop, WooCommerce, and Magento software.
index.ofertxt12: API Integrations for CRM, ERP, Wordpress, PrestaShop, and other systems.
index.softtxt1:
We design modern and effective websites,
perfectly tailored to your business
index.softtxt2:
What programming languages and frameworks
do we use to create Applications?
index.softtxt4: A scripting programming language designed to generate web pages and build real-time web applications. PHP is most often used for server-side web scripting, but it can also be used for command-line data processing. The implementation of PHP together with the Apache web server and the MySQL database server is referred to as the AMP platform.
index.softtxt6: A JavaScript programming language library used to create graphical user interfaces for web applications. It was created by Jordan Walke, a Facebook programmer, and inspired by the PHP language extension - XHP. One of the main distinguishing features of the React.js library is the virtual DOM. React stores the entire application DOM in memory.
index.softtxt7: A scripting and multi-paradigm programming language, created by Netscape, most commonly used on websites. These scripts are most often used to provide interaction by responding to events, validating data entered in forms, or creating complex visual effects. JavaScript scripts run by websites have significantly limited access to the user's computer. On the server side, JavaScript can run as Node.js.
index.softtxt9: A markup language used to create and present web pages. It is an evolution of the HTML 4 language and its XML variant (XHTML 1), developed as part of the work of the WHATWG (Web Hypertext Application Technology Working Group) and W3C.
index.softtxt11: An open-source, cross-platform runtime environment for developing server-side applications written in the JavaScript language. It contributed to the creation of the "JavaScript everywhere" paradigm, enabling developers to build applications within a single programming language instead of relying on separate server-side languages.
index.softtxt13: An open framework and platform for creating SPAs, written in TypeScript and supported and developed by Google. Angular was initially intended to be the second version of the AngularJS framework, but design decisions led Google to release it as a separate product, partly due to a lack of backward compatibility and a simple update path for applications written in AngularJS to Angular 2.
index.softtxt16: A web application framework written in the PHP language based on the Model-View-Controller architectural pattern. Laravel provides, among other things, a modular system for building applications with a dedicated dependency manager, various ways to access relational databases, and tools to assist in application deployment and maintenance.

polityka.title: Privacy Policy
polityka.description: Professional programming services for business: website design, online stores, CRM/ERP systems in Zielona Góra and Świebodzin. Comprehensive IT solutions with SEO and 24/7 support.
polityka.heading: Privacy Policy
polityka.politykatxt03: The Privacy Policy specifies how personal data of Users necessary for providing electronic services via the website www.maxsoft.pl is collected, processed, and stored.
polityka.politykatxt04: The website collects only personal data necessary for providing and developing the services offered within it.
polityka.politykatxt05: Personal data collected via the Website is processed in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation, hereinafter GDPR) and the Personal Data Protection Act of 10 May 2018.
polityka.politykatxt07: The controller of personal data collected via the website is the company:
polityka.politykatxt10: III. Purpose of Personal Data Collection
polityka.politykatxt11: Personal data is used for the purpose of:
polityka.politykatxt12: Providing data is voluntary but necessary to conclude a contract or use other functionalities of the Website.
polityka.politykatxt13: IV. Types of Processed Personal Data
polityka.politykatxt14: The Controller may process the User's personal data: first and last name, date of birth, residential address, email address, phone number, NIP.
polityka.politykatxt15: V. Period of Personal Data Processing
polityka.politykatxt16: Users' personal data will be processed for the period:
polityka.politykatxt17: when the basis for processing is the performance of a contract - until the statute of limitations for claims after its performance,
polityka.politykatxt18: when the basis for processing is consent - until its withdrawal, and after withdrawal of consent until the statute of limitations for claims.
polityka.politykatxt19: In both cases, the statute of limitations period is 6 years, and for periodic claims and claims related to business activities - 3 years (unless otherwise provided by special regulations).
polityka.politykatxt21: Users' personal data may be disclosed to: entities affiliated with the Controller, its subcontractors, entities cooperating with the Controller, e.g. companies handling e-payments, courier/postal service providers, law firms.
polityka.politykatxt22: Users' personal data will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
polityka.politykatxt24: The Website User has the right to: access to the content of their personal data, their rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, object to processing, withdraw consent at any time (which does not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal).
polityka.politykatxt25: A request to exercise the rights listed above should be sent to: biuro@maxsoft.pl.
polityka.politykatxt26: The Controller shall fulfill or refuse to fulfill the request immediately - no later than within one month of receiving it.
polityka.politykatxt27: The User has the right to lodge a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office if they consider that the processing violates their rights and freedoms (GDPR).
polityka.politykatxt29: Users' data cannot be processed in an automated manner resulting in any decisions being made against them.
polityka.politykatxt30: Users' data may be profiled for the purpose of customizing content and personalizing offers after obtaining their consent.
polityka.politykatxt32: The Controller reserves the right to amend the Privacy Policy, provided that Users' rights are not restricted.
polityka.politykatxt33: Information about introduced changes will appear in the form of a notice available on the Website.
polityka.politykatxt34: In matters not regulated in this Privacy Policy, the provisions of the GDPR and Polish law shall apply.
polityka.politykatxt35:
• account registration and user identity verification,
  • enabling login to the Website,
  • performance of the contract regarding services and e-services,
  • communication with the User (phone, contact form, etc.),
  • sending a newsletter (after the User consents to receiving it),
  • operating the comment system,
  • providing social services,
  • promoting the Controller's offer,
  • marketing, remarketing, and affiliate activities,
  • personalizing the Website for Users,
  • analytical and statistical activities,
  • debt collection,
  • establishing, pursuing, or defending against claims.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.description: Professional programming services for business: website design, online stores, CRM/ERP systems in Zielona Góra and Świebodzin. Comprehensive IT solutions with SEO and 24/7 support.
cookies.heading: Cookies Policy
cookies.cookiestxt02: Cookies (so-called "cookies") constitute IT data, in particular text files, stored on the User's end device and intended for using the Website's internet pages. Cookies usually contain the name of the website they come from, the time they are stored on the end device, and a unique number.
cookies.cookiestxt04: The controller of personal data collected via the website is the company:
cookies.cookiestxt08: The Website collects information using cookies files - session cookies, persistent cookies, and third-party cookies.
cookies.cookiestxt09: Collecting cookies supports the proper provision of services on the Website and serves statistical purposes.
cookies.cookiestxt10: The User may specify the scope of cookies access to their device in the browser settings.
cookies.cookiestxt11: The Website Operator informs that restricting the use of cookies may affect some functionalities available on the Website's pages.
cookies.cookiestxt12: Cookies placed on the User's end device may also be used by advertisers and partners cooperating with the Website Operator.
